azurerm_security_center_contact.description: Manages the subscription's Security Center Contact.

email.description: The email of the Security Center Contact.

phone.description: The phone number of the Security Center Contact.

alert_notifications.description: Whether to send security alerts notifications to the security contact.

alerts_to_admins.description: Whether to send security alerts notifications to subscription admins.

create.description: Used when creating the Security Center Contact.

update.description: Used when updating the Security Center Contact.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Security Center Contact.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Security Center Contact.
